website_summaries.verdict: Rockford Fosgate's Bluetooth Adapter makes a convenient fit for some cars, but the lack of phone features limits it to music.
pros: The Rockford Fosgate Universal Bluetooth Audio Adapter is designed as a 12-volt power point plug-in for a car, and includes a USB charging port pass-through
cons: This Bluetooth Adapter includes no hands-free phone features, nor the ability to skip songs

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a car from 2015. It's not the kind that can easily swap radios. The center console would have to change. I didn't want to do that just to add bluetooth music streaming. I already had bluetooth calling in the car. But there was a set of RCA jacks for the AUX connection in the arm rest. Plugged this device in, paired to my phone and worked like a charm. When I start the car it connects in a second. When I shut the car off it stops playing. The only caveat is I have to press play on my phone again when I get back into the car. Impressed with how well this device works.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you need a simple solution for enabling bluetooth ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you need a simple solution for enabling bluetooth music (but not handsfree phone use) through your car stereo. My Samsung Galaxy S6 is set-up to play bluetooth music through this system into my car stereo; but when a call comes in, its gets directed to my bluetooth headset... which is exactly what I wanted. (If I have someone in the car, this set-up helps avoid the inevitable, "Hi, you've got me in the car with another person on speaker" scenario). If you get a little static, don't forget to buy a ground loop noise isolator... this is a car-specific wiring problem (incl in my Mazda3) but easily solved. I bought this one @
customer_reviews.author: O. Duek

customer_reviews.title: Early electronics failure; waiting for seller response
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 6 weeks with only occasional use, but the electronics failed 2 weeks after the return window closed. We were driving along, listening to a podcast, when the unit gave a 'pop' and smoke came out of the device. Considering how little I used this bluetooth adaptor, it failed extremely quickly. It would be greatly appreciated if the seller would contact me about a return/replacement; I hope that my unit failing so quickly is the exception rather than the rule for these devices, as they offer functionality that I did appreciate (for the 6 weeks it was working).
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: High Pitched Whine Noise Problem
customer_reviews.text: Device has a high pitched whine that can only be overcome by turning the volume to max on the smartphone and turning the volume down on the car radio speakers. This leaves you without any volume control for when you get on the freeway unless you turn the whine back up by increasing the car speaker volume again. In short, it can be made to work but it sucks. This could have been prevented by a final test step before packaging and shipping (unless the design is faulty). Lesson for entrepreneurs - preserve your product's and your company's quality reputation instead of short cutting a normal manufacturing process step.
customer_reviews.author: raven swoops along ridge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I added an AUX port to my car so I could listen to music, but found the cable to cumbersome. The competitors require you to charge their adapters and that's the last thing I needed was to keep track of how charged my adapter is at all times. This runs off the cigarette lighter, so no charging. The sound quality was equal to being physically plugged in to my aux port, which is really impressive. Reconnects automatically, just great. The next time they should put forward, back, pause/play buttons to take it over the top. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hise

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly. Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Finally, a Bluetooth adaptor that works with Audi Q7 MMI to 3.5mm cable. Both ViseeO 1000 & 3000 which are more expensive failed to work or pick up audio from my iPhone 5s running on iOS 9.2, even after updating the ViseeO software. This USB adaptor pairs up in seconds. Just plug in the 3.5mm from your AMI/MMI into it and good to go. It even has additional port for USB charging. Connects automatically when I turn my car on.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeks

customer_reviews.title: And I have great sound. Once I am paired with my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: So I have a 3008 Goldwing and have had a hodgepodge of devices to play music through my bike. This little device and a inexpensive ground loop isolator between it and my AUX input..... And I have great sound. Once I am paired with my phone or my iPod I am good to go.
customer_reviews.author: becesteve

customer_reviews.title: Getting a high pitched feedback
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Easy to set up. But I am getting a high pitched feedback. Any remedies for this?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good BT auxiliary solution but lack of rapid charge USB makes it a bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Owning this it really depends on your needs but for me it can't be more useful. I have 2 cars abs 2 of these, 1 fire each car. Sounds great and a big improvement over other BT auxiliary solutions. The only gripe is the lack of 1 amp USB capability. The USB power outlet is only half amp which is a disappointment. I'd be willing to pay more to have rapid charging with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Quality and Value

customer_reviews.title: It connected easily, and so far is working flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to connect an iPhone in a 2013 Mini Cooper to play Bluetooth audio. It connected easily, and so far is working flawlessly. It's compact, with great sound quality. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my Honda
customer_reviews.text: Does the job quite well for my Honda, which included Bluetooth for phone calls but not for Audio. Phone calls went through the Honda Bluetooth link no problem, and podcast and music audio went through this little guy. Took a minute to get it paired, but it works like a charm. Only wish I had gotten this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: modulated

customer_reviews.title: A little noise
customer_reviews.text: It works fine except for the engine noise that comes in as feedback. The noise is not bad at all and I can live with it. I just wish it had a battery so it can be unplugged once in a while. The wire it comes with is short but works fine for my situation. I will not keep up with charging when streaming music or just talking.
customer_reviews.author: Louie T. Sr

customer_reviews.title: Good design, poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Compact and well designed but sounds horrible on my Porsche CDR31/Bose, so flat and muted, drops are also frequent. My $8 Logitech BT outperforms this by far.
customer_reviews.author: LELC

customer_reviews.title: A Buy
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Really upgraded my driving experience, got it for road trips and was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, use it nearly everyday. Automatically turns on/off with ignition and auto pairs after initial Bluetooth setup. I'm using in an early 90's Toyota pickup with a Sony CD player with an aux port.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Aux to Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my truck for bluetooth to my integrated aux option. Automatically pairs with phone each time I start the truck, and audio quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hanchey

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic! We plugged from lighter outlet to aux ...
customer_reviews.text: Works like magic! We plugged from lighter outlet to aux outlet with a 6 inch cord we already had, and you barely even notice it. SO much better than having to keep the phone plugged into the aux cable. At times I even forget its there!
customer_reviews.author: C Handy

customer_reviews.title: The BEST bluetooth receiver!
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few other bluetooth receivers and this one tops them all by far. To connect when I get in my vehicle it only requires a quick press and release of the blue diamond shaped button. It powers on, plays a tone and connects automatically. No power/recharging issues since it stays plugged in all the time unlike the others I've tried. The built in charger works great too. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Doug P.

customer_reviews.title: This little adapter saved me from replacing two aftermarket stereos ...
customer_reviews.text: This little adapter saved me from replacing two aftermarket stereos, only because I wanted Bluetooth. Now I get in the car, turn the key and within seconds my phone is paired and playing through my JVC!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnieCrunch

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as intended. 4 stars because this product ...
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as intended. 4 stars because this product should have a ground loop noise isolator integrated into it. I suggest buyingas well
customer_reviews.author: M. Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing works awesome. Connects fast and has clear great sound quality. I'm using it on a 2013 ls camaro. My problem was I only had Bluetooth for phone calls and not music streaming. My 12v outlet and aux plug in are both in my center console so it's nice that it's not even in view. Feels just like a part of the car. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but I hear feedback through my speakers. Could be an aux problem though.
customer_reviews.author: gina_martini

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Easy connection, once connected it’ll auto reconnect every time you turn the car on. Works on my bmw e90 beautifully. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: GerL

customer_reviews.title: but works good for the most part
customer_reviews.text: looses connection occasionally which may be loose connection power my adaptor . but works good for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this to use in my 2009 Honda Accord which ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to use in my 2009 Honda Accord which has bluetooth but does not stream music via bluetooth. I am only giving it 3 stars for now because when I first plugged it in it worked exactly the way I expected it to but a few minutes later there was a "pop" and a smell of burnt electronics. I sent it back and am waiting on a replacement. Hope it was just a faulty one. I will update my review after I receive the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: KENIA

customer_reviews.title: Good but not Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and easy way to add bluetooth to your car but it's not as seamless as an OEM system...sometimes it doesn't re-connect as it should.
customer_reviews.author: JayBee

customer_reviews.title: Stop worrying and get this
customer_reviews.text: I've been hesitant to purchase one of these devices due to the potential for feedback noise and degraded sound quality versus wiring my phone directly to the AUX port. I have to say, my concerns are unfounded. The audio sounds great from my HTC One M8. If you do turn it up beyond safe listening levels you will hear a slight break down in the audio quality. However, for normal to above normal levels, the audio sounds great in my '08 GS350.
customer_reviews.author: daman7676

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Pairs with phone easily.
customer_reviews.text: This product is ideal for my needs. Pairing with my phone took a couple of seconds.My phone (LG G4) flawlessly connects with the unit automatically and begins streaming music within 15 seconds after starting my car. Only feature which would be nice to have would've been a fast-forward button to skip songs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works better than I had hoped for. Simple setup in my 2012 Hyundai Genesis 4.6 Sedan
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel L. Diaz Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works very good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I had one that needed to be turned on every time I started the car and that was annoying. This one works great and fits nicely in the side compartment of my car. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson A Gomez-Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great option for my e46 BMW that has aux input but no bluetooth connectivity. Easy option to keep my iphone free of any cords while still streaming from my playlists! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Ricker

customer_reviews.title: Easy, small profile
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy, small profile, turns on automatically. Cons: AUX port is horrible, if you use a gold connector (tried several), expect static. Only works static free with included cable and other non gold plated connectors. Note: I exchanged this product twice and results were the same. I would expect more from RF. Car: 2007 BMW 328i Sedan.
customer_reviews.author: Shredder

customer_reviews.title: Easy to plug in and sync to
customer_reviews.text: Simple and exactly what I was looking for. Easy to plug in and sync to. Send a faint audible alert when the car starts and when the phone connects. I would buy more if I had cars to plug them into.
customer_reviews.author: Shaine Richards

customer_reviews.title: For some reason it does not auto-connect to my bluetooth ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason it does not auto-connect to my bluetooth phone, it could be the other bluetooth devices such as my Jabra handsfree speaker microphone. But once manually bluetooth connected it works flawlessly with my car's audio system.
customer_reviews.author: Marty B.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up... Plug, pair, and play. For sensitive ears, there is an audible whine if volume is up but not playing music. It does not affect other stereo inputs such as FM, CD, etc. Just Aux, and only when it is on, but not playing music.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bryant

customer_reviews.title: To much buzz interference
customer_reviews.text: I have a Malibu Wakestter boat with a awesome Rockford system. This adapter makes the system buzz so loud from the interence I couldnt stand using it and losing quality. I would not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: Ok does the job. Sometimes skips the audio which can be annoying but the product works as advertised and the convenience oouweighs the annoyance
customer_reviews.author: PlasticMan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly turns off when not in use just hit the button to turn back on.
customer_reviews.author: james v hoey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best aux Bluetooth adapter, great sound reseption. Got 2 or them work amazing
customer_reviews.author: Petro Kolesnik

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for the first two weeks i had it then my music started to cut out. Thought it was my phone at first but my phone works fine with the bluetooth in my moms sierra. Will be looking into other options.
customer_reviews.author: Omar M. Moussa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I highly recommend The product, and purchasing from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: facebooK

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Initial pairing was quick and Bluetooth playback is immediate. Much faster than the $600 JVC head unit we just installed in our other car. Please note this is for audio playback only not for bluetooth phone connections.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I have an HTC One M8 and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have an HTC One M8 and it does take it a few seconds to connect by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but my phone doesn't connect to it each time I get in the car
customer_reviews.author: Sergec

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm in my 08 Audi A5
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm in my 08 Audi A5. Audio only so u can still use your MMI phone functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a simple product that solves a common problem. ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a simple product that solves a common problem. Works as expected with the Sound quality you would expect from Rockford fosgate.
customer_reviews.author: M. Olmos

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect. It would be a big bonus if the phone calls would come thru but I still highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: gSpin

customer_reviews.title: Product worked great for 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for 30 days, then quit. Phones no longer seeing Bluetooth signal / able to connect (tried several to ensure device was the problem). Outside of return period by a week.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Smith

customer_reviews.title: GETTING GOOD USE OUT OF IT
customer_reviews.text: I'M ENJOYING THIS ITEM VERY MUCH, GETTING GOOD USE OUT OF IT.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Try another product.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a buzzing noise whenever I accelerate my car. It's really only tolerable if your volume isn't too high. I wish I would've returned this product when I had a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: NO problems connecting to my iPhone6. It works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Charging feature stopped working 3 months after I purchased. Can't return it to Amazon so I am trying to see if under warranty with manufactuer. What a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: MCN

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work on my Harley Street Glide or my BMW 750LI. Threw it in the trash. A waste of money
customer_reviews.author: raphfel moss

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product and does what it says. Super sound quality. The only draw back is you have to press the lighted button on the back of the device every time to connect to your phone. Other than that its great.
customer_reviews.author: E2

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...for 1 week
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about a week, however after that, only the right channel functioned. When I connected my phone directly to the AUX jack, the left and right channels worked. I will return a purchase another and give this product one more try.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sakamoto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots up and automatically on start and connects with my phone and is ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Issac Berte

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd bought this months ago instead of constantly plugging my phone into a stupid little headphone cord to stream Pandora in my car...
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Mcneely

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it promises. Auto connects within seconds, compared to my Tunelink it's night and day. excellent product!!
customer_reviews.author: oZ

customer_reviews.title: rockford fosgate bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my iphone and samsung galaxy tab 3 clear and load no more cords love it would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works but will skip or hiccup about every 1-2 minutes
customer_reviews.author: abelbolog

customer_reviews.title: Did not even Power up. Got a second one ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not even Power up. Got a second one and it did not work either. Should get negative 1 Star.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Banyan

customer_reviews.title: Don'  buy this item
customer_reviews.text: It's the worst product I've purchased from amazon. It internally red within minutes of being plug into my car. I'm in process of returning it. Also, I went ahead a bought the HTC Stereo Clip. I used it daily with no problems, plus great sound.
customer_reviews.author: justin d. horn

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product it must have been defective I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product it must have been defective I plugged it in the cigarette lighter it lit up once and never lit up again
customer_reviews.author: WC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective. Only one earbud work. I had to request for a refund
customer_reviews.author: dam

customer_reviews.title: Works great, only downside is a slight feedback you get
customer_reviews.text: Works great, only downside is a slight feedback you get, but if you have music on at a reasonable level the music overpowers it. EDIT: purchased the ViseeO Tune2Air WMA3000B Bluetooth Adapter to replace the RFBTAUX and would recommend spending the extra money if you have a BMW. works with steering wheel controls and does not have any feedback
customer_reviews.author: Peter T Medgyesy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution if  you can't replace your head unit or you're on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: I drive a Saab 9-3 Aero. For those of you that know this car, you cannot replace the head unit with an aftermarket radio. That precluded me from being able to upgrade the radio to something with bluetooth. The Rockford Universal Car Adapter was PERFECT!!! It sits inside the console and everytime I get in the car, I've got bluetooth for my music! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Riedel

customer_reviews.title: USB port stopped working after 18 months. Good up til then!
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity of this adapter. It worked great for my '09 VW Tiguan, until it didn't. The USB port stopped working. It gave me a year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Eriksen

customer_reviews.title: go for it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I have had the possibility of listening to music on my car with this item at the same time I have my cellphone connected to the hands free calling in my car. UPGRADE (4 months later): This product continue working very good. It connects as fast as less than a minute. Never fails. I am pretty glad about it. Best product ever!
customer_reviews.author: ebr319

customer_reviews.title: This device works great! My MINI didn't come with Bluetooth music streaming ...
customer_reviews.text: This device works great! My MINI didn't come with Bluetooth music streaming capabilities (only phone calls) so as long as your device's Bluetooth is on, the Rockford RFBTAUX connects instantly when you enter the car. Works flawlessly and never disconnects. If you are in need of Bluetooth for music in your ride, I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Papabear

customer_reviews.title: This product works great. It's better then what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. It's better then what I expected. I have had it for several months now and it is still going good and the sound is amazing. My advice to anyone that gets this product, after reading the bad reviews, don't leave it plugged in to a 12v outlet that does not turn off when your vehicle is off. It will auto connect to your device.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hogg

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Had to return my first one after a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had to return my first one after a couple of weeks because the USB charging quit working. Quick and easy return and they had me a new one in the mail the same day. The second one has been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wright

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The button fell out after about a month, still worked, but had to jiggle it.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Strumlok

customer_reviews.title: Buy One
customer_reviews.text: Just works. No BS, no problems. Actually produces better sound in my car than a direct AUX connection from my iPhone. BTW - shipped to Mexico without delays and, in fact, appeared a day early. Kudos to Rockford Fosgate and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: down in Mexico

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Performs just as well as some cheaper products on the market, however the Rockford-Fosgate amps up the bass a little bit much. Keep in mind, you WILL need some kind of ground loop/noise isolator/suppressor with this product unless your amp comes with one built in to it.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk R.

customer_reviews.title: Great, connects well and the audio sounds as good as my stereo will let it
customer_reviews.text: Works great, haven't had any problems with it. My car starts up, my phone connects to it, and I'm set to listen to my podcasts. I've read some posts about the sound being uneven. I ordered this even with those reviews and have been actively listening for it. I haven't had any sound problems yet, but If I do I'll report back
customer_reviews.author: A-Rae

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth option
customer_reviews.text: Great product to add Bluetooth to vehicle. It turns on when you start you car and connects automatically. Then it's great because it automatically disconnects when you turn off your car
customer_reviews.author: bummydill

customer_reviews.title: good audio input option
customer_reviews.text: out of 2 other bluetooth audio units, this one has lasted the longest and has the best overall connectivity range, used daily in a work truck where music options are slim and upgrading the equipment is not an option, I would purchase this again if a replacement was needed
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Ramos Jr

customer_reviews.title: A perfect car Bluetooth solution
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a month and have been very impressed, I can't detect any loss of audio quality or addition of noise from the Bluetooth. I haven't experienced any connection issues either, never dropped my phone and it connects almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Benjaminicus

customer_reviews.title: The device isn't that bad for the money . Good range
customer_reviews.text: Works good for a non bluetooth unit, has some static if no music is being played but I would recommend It for a simple add on to a system that doesn't have BT
customer_reviews.author: Todd Workman

customer_reviews.title: ( Maybe it just doesn't like my car (2010 Prius)
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all for me. Can't see the device in Bluetooth after connecting and powering on :( Maybe it just doesn't like my car (2010 Prius).
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth works great, USB not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth pairing works great. Which is exactly what I bought this product for period however the USB port does not function. You cannot charge anything from the USB.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.

customer_reviews.title: "Duffman can't connect, oh no!"
customer_reviews.text: The device came timely but didn't actually function as indicated on the provided packaged instructions. The led light didn't work nor did the device connect automatically. Additionally, the USB accessory input would work only some of the time. For how costly this device is, there should be more features and stable performance. One consolation: the sound quality was pretty good actually. There was zero white noise.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Poor audio quality but does its job
customer_reviews.text: There is a constant high-pitched whistling with this device. There are also infrequent but prevalent dropouts, but I think this affects all similar devices. I got a Griffin iTrip instead; the audio quality is far better, no whistling whatsoever, but still getting dropouts.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: It works fine now and the blue tooth
customer_reviews.text: The item arived NIB but the USB charging port was loose / broken/ sank inside the housing,couldn't plug a usb cable to charge the phone so instead of dealing with the head ache of returning it, I took it apart and solder the port back on the circuit board. Took about 10 min. It works fine now and the blue tooth ...easy to connect to/ with any device. Sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ACCESSORY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no distortion in sound used it with my Moto X. Highly recommned!! Way better than aux cable. Connects instantly when getting into car.
customer_reviews.author: Robeo1081

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as expected. Good sound quality and keeps my iPhone charged. If you need to make calls, this guy won't help, but if you want to blast sweet, sweet music from your phone to your car stereo over blue tooth, this thing just works.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 2012 Volt
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I don't know why every car doesnt have this feature built in. This thing thing rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney G Miller

customer_reviews.title: Makes my factory car stereo sound like its worth $1,000
customer_reviews.text: Everything is all neat and tidy now. No wires! The sound that comes through this Bluetooth is amazing. It seems to regulate the bass some, but after a small tweak with the EQ on the phone it was better than ever. Setting up the device was flawless.The device always reconnects as soon as you start the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jason mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for factory radio with aux input
customer_reviews.text: I used this to stream music from my smartphone to the factory stereo for seamless crystal clear sound. No buzz or interference from the adapter. took maybe 10 seconds to pair, no worries of battery drain and automatically syncs back up as soon as I turn on the vehicle. The USB port is only for charging, and is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Boike

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I needed! I ordered this to replace one of those Bluetooth adapters that has cords everywhere. This one has one cord! I love it and it sounds amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good little adapter
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy set up. Not an eye sore like 99.9% of all the other Bluetooth car adapters out there.
customer_reviews.author: Enz

customer_reviews.title: The only downfall is the 3. 5 mm connector ...
customer_reviews.text: The only downfall is the 3.5 mm connector is a little small and sometimes moves with bumps in the roads resulting in the sound only coming out of the left or right speakers until you adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever! Plug it in and forget about it. It does exactly what its supposed to do. I knew Rockford wouldn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with quality and design of the Bluetooth adapter ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with quality and design of the Bluetooth adapter! Rockford Fosgate is the way to go!! can never go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R

customer_reviews.title: terrible audio
customer_reviews.text: As a previous reviewer mentioned the sound only comes out of one side for whatever reason. I can fiddle with it and it will go back to all speakers but as soon as I go over a bump I lose the sound again. Tried to return the items and they wouldn't allow me since it was over 30 days. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: It works, look no further you may be dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy pairing. Name brand quality, features and performance. Exelent addition to factory stereo
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome adapter
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with it especially having a 2008 Accord with no Bluetooth sounds even better then factory one in my 14 Civic
customer_reviews.author: Vince L

customer_reviews.title: So far so good - equal to my Tunelink that just died
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - equal to my Tunelink that just died. Got this because it was cheap...at it works! Sound is solid too.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth on Harley-Davidson Touring w Factory Head Unit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to both charge my phone and allow me to utilize my aux port on my factory Harley-Davidson radio to stream both music and navi. The product was easy to pair and has been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, came with a audio cable and auto connects to my phone and when I answer a call it mutes the music.
customer_reviews.author: Claydoggie
